text: Little Drac () is a French animated television series. It was broadcast in 1991 on M6. The program was created by Bruno Ren√© Huchez and Bahram Rohani. The series is about Little Drac, Count Dracula's son. The young vampire has to struggle against Gousse D'Ail. == Other websites== * Category:1990s French television series Category:1990s animated television series Category:French animated television series
title: Little Drac
